    1: from __future__ import annotations
    2: 
    3: from abc import ABC
    4: 
    5: from virtualenv.create.creator import Creator
    6: from virtualenv.create.describe import Describe
    7: 
    8: 
    9: class VirtualenvBuiltin(Creator, Describe, ABC):
   10:     """A creator that does operations itself without delegation, if we can create it we can also describe it."""
   11: 
   12:     def __init__(self, options, interpreter) -> None:
   13:         Creator.__init__(self, options, interpreter)
   14:         Describe.__init__(self, self.dest, interpreter)
   15: 
   16: 
   17: __all__ = [
   18:     "VirtualenvBuiltin",
   19: ]
